channel.title: Choob is back. (Malevolence 317)
channel.description:
Hey guys, Jay here...
About a year ago, I had a somewhat successful server running, called Choob. It went down suddenly and without warning, but now, It's back at [url=http://www.malevolence.x10.mx]www.malevolence.x10.mx[/url]
We have godsword specs, statius, vestas, chaotics and much more. DFS spec works, and so does claw spec. Corp is still here, and is still, thusfar, unsoloable. [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/815/img3g.png[/img] [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/4690/img2ee.png[/img] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/9161/img1cp.png[/img] We also have working GWD. [img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/2333/img5p.png[/img]
Now all we're missing is you, the players.

item.title: Choob is back. (Malevolence 317)
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

I`m working on my own content

Read full topic

item.title: Choob is back. (Malevolence 317)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Just try and create some of your own content next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Choob is back. (Malevolence 317)
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:6, topic:446087”][quote author=infallibl3 link=topic=548946.msg4025386#msg4025386 date=1340302208]

complete leech from the deception source.

nigh, i fixed some memory leaks, added some shops, changed some methods and editted the commands to be more organized. I also removed a glitch in the wildy with pvp points, and I’m in the midst of adding nomad, thanks.
[/quote]okay… complete leech from deception and used a couple of tutorials.
even if you didn’t, lets break this down;
memory leaks: easy
changed methods: usually extremely easy
command organization: very easy
pvp point glitch: extremely easy
nomad: extremely easy [yes, even adding perfect nomad]

so, all-in-all, this is nearly a complete leech, thanks.[/quote]

right, now you fix the bone drops, k? I’m not done, I’ve been developing for awhile now. Theres a lot I’m going to change, a lot I have changed, and a lot I want to add. I release it now because people have been asking for choob since it went down. troll someone else.

Read full topic

item.title: Choob is back. (Malevolence 317)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“infallibl3, post:5, topic:446087”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=548946.msg4025322#msg4025322 date=1340299184]
complete leech from the deception source.
[/quote]

nigh, i fixed some memory leaks, added some shops, changed some methods and editted the commands to be more organized. I also removed a glitch in the wildy with pvp points, and I’m in the midst of adding nomad, thanks.[/quote]okay… complete leech from deception and used a couple of tutorials.
even if you didn’t, lets break this down;
memory leaks: easy
changed methods: usually extremely easy
command organization: very easy
pvp point glitch: extremely easy
nomad: extremely easy [yes, even adding perfect nomad]

so, all-in-all, this is nearly a complete leech, thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

Uncalled:

complete leech from the deception source.

nigh, i fixed some memory leaks, added some shops, changed some methods and editted the commands to be more organized. I also removed a glitch in the wildy with pvp points, and I’m in the midst of adding nomad, thanks.

Hey guys, Jay here…

About a year ago, I had a somewhat successful server running, called Choob. It went down suddenly and without warning, but now, It’s back at www.malevolence.x10.mx

We have godsword specs, statius, vestas, chaotics and much more. DFS spec works, and so does claw spec. Corp is still here, and is still, thusfar, unsoloable.
